au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.main

Class RigClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.main.RigClient

  • public class RigClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Startup and shutdown class. Shutdown error codes:
    • 0 - exit normal.
    • 1 - unhandled exception.
    • 2 - rig type class cannot be loaded and resolved.
    • 3 - rig client server cannot be started.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Configuration.

      Whether to restart the rig client.

      Logger.

      Listening server.

      The main thread.

      Notifies the rig client to shutdown.

      Soft restarts the rig client.

      Runs the program forever, until notified to shutdown.

      Starts the rig client (called through JNI).

    • Method Detail

      • runProgram

        public void runProgram()
        Runs the program forever, until notified to shutdown.

      • start

        public static void start()
        Starts the rig client (called through JNI).

      • stop

        public static void stop()
        Notifies the rig client to shutdown.

      • blockingStop

        public static void blockingStop()
        Notifies the rig client to shutdown. This method blocks until the rig client has completed shutting down.

      • restart

        public static void restart()
        Soft restarts the rig client. It is soft because the JVM itself is not terminated.
